question: What are the benefits of a healthy diet?
answer: A healthy diet helps to maintain a balanced weight, improves heart health, and boosts the immune system. It also contributes to better mental health and can prevent chronic diseases.
answer_with_citation: A healthy diet helps to maintain a balanced weight[1], improves heart health[2], and boosts the immune system[3]. It also contributes to better mental health[4] and can prevent chronic diseases[5].

docs.text: Maintaining a balanced weight is one of the key benefits of a healthy diet. It involves consuming the right amount of nutrients.
A diet rich in fruits, vegetables, and whole grains can significantly improve heart health by reducing cholesterol levels.
Boosting the immune system can be achieved by consuming vitamins and minerals found in a balanced diet.
Mental health benefits from a healthy diet include improved mood and cognitive function.
Chronic diseases such as diabetes and hypertension can be prevented with a balanced and nutritious diet.
Proper hydration is also a component of a healthy diet, which helps in maintaining bodily functions.
A diet that includes a variety of foods can ensure the body gets a range of essential nutrients.
Nutrient-dense foods like leafy greens, berries, and nuts can provide significant health benefits.
